title: W-6 Live Prices & Caching
description: Live price fetching for tradeable assets (stocks, ETFs, crypto) with 15-minute cache TTL. Exchange rates cached hourly. Graceful fallback to cached prices with staleness indicators when fetches fail.

userStories.title: Create price cache database schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a price_cache table to store fetched prices.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `price_cache` table with Drizzle schema in `lib/db/schema.ts`

Fields: id (uuid), symbol (text), price (decimal), currency (enum: AUD, NZD, USD), change_percent (decimal nullable), change_absolute (decimal nullable), fetched_at (timestamp), source (text: 'yahoo' | 'coingecko')

userStories.title: Create exchange rate cache schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to cache exchange rates for currency conversion.
acceptanceCriteria: Fields: id (uuid), from_currency (text), to_currency (text), rate (decimal), fetched_at (timestamp)

userStories.title: Create Yahoo Finance price service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a service to fetch stock/ETF prices from Yahoo Finance.
acceptanceCriteria: Handles ASX symbols (append .AX if not present)
Handles NZX symbols (append .NZ if not present)
Throws descriptive error on failure (network, invalid symbol)

userStories.title: Create CoinGecko price service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a service to fetch crypto prices from CoinGecko.
acceptanceCriteria: Maps common symbols to CoinGecko IDs (BTC->bitcoin, ETH->ethereum, etc.)
Supports optional COINGECKO_API_KEY for higher rate limits
Falls back to free tier if no key provided

userStories.title: Create exchange rate service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a service to fetch exchange rates.
acceptanceCriteria: Uses free exchange rate API (e.g., exchangerate-api.com)
Returns rate (e.g., 1.53 for USD to AUD)

userStories.title: Create price cache service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a service to manage price caching with TTL.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns null if no cache or expired

userStories.title: Create exchange rate cache service
userStories.description: As a developer, I need caching for exchange rates with 1-hour TTL.
acceptanceCriteria: Function `getExchangeRate(from, to): Promise<number>` (fetches if not cached/expired)

userStories.title: Create unified price fetcher
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a unified interface to fetch prices for any holding.
acceptanceCriteria: Routes to Yahoo Finance for stock/etf, CoinGecko for crypto
Checks cache first, fetches if expired
Returns cached price with staleness flag on fetch failure
PriceResult: { price, currency, changePercent, changeAbsolute, fetchedAt, isStale, error? }

userStories.title: Create prices API - refresh endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to refresh prices for holdings.
acceptanceCriteria: POST /api/prices/refresh accepts optional `holding_ids` array (or refreshes all if omitted)
Fetches fresh prices for specified tradeable holdings
Returns array of results: { holdingId, symbol, price, changePercent, isStale, error? }
Handles partial failures (some succeed, some fail)

userStories.title: Create prices API - GET endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to get current cached prices.
acceptanceCriteria: GET /api/prices returns cached prices for all tradeable holdings
Includes staleness indicator (fetchedAt, isStale based on TTL)

userStories.title: Create exchange rates API endpoint
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an API endpoint to get exchange rates.

userStories.title: Add price display to holdings list
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see current prices on my holdings list.
acceptanceCriteria: Holdings list shows 'Price' column for tradeable holdings (stock, etf, crypto)
Displays current price in holding's native currency
Shows daily change: +2.5% ($1.23) in green, -1.2% ($0.50) in red
Stale prices (>15 min) show warning indicator
Error state shows last price with error icon

userStories.title: Add market value to holdings list
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see the market value of each holding.
acceptanceCriteria: Holdings list shows 'Market Value' column for tradeable holdings
Market Value = quantity x current price
Shows '-' if no quantity or no price

userStories.title: Add unrealized gain/loss display
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to see unrealized gain/loss for each holding.
acceptanceCriteria: Holdings list shows 'Gain/Loss' column for tradeable holdings
Also shows percentage: ((Market Value / Cost Basis) - 1) x 100
Green for gains, red for losses
Shows '-' if no cost basis or no price

userStories.title: Add refresh prices button
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to manually refresh all prices.
acceptanceCriteria: 'Refresh Prices' button on holdings page header
On success: updates displayed prices, shows success toast
On partial failure: shows warning toast with count of failures

userStories.title: Auto-refresh prices on page load
userStories.description: As Roland, I want prices to automatically refresh when I open the holdings page.
acceptanceCriteria: Holdings page triggers price refresh on mount
Only refreshes if any cached price is stale (>15 min)
Does not block page render (shows cached prices immediately)

userStories.title: Individual holding price refresh with retry
userStories.description: As Roland, I want to retry fetching a price if it failed.
acceptanceCriteria: Holdings with fetch errors show retry button/icon
Clicking retry refreshes just that holding's price
Shows loading state on that row only
Updates price on success, shows error toast on repeated failure

userStories.title: Symbol-to-CoinGecko ID mapping
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a mapping from common crypto symbols to CoinGecko IDs.
acceptanceCriteria: Map common symbols: BTC->bitcoin, ETH->ethereum, SOL->solana, etc.
Cover top 50 cryptocurrencies by market cap
Return null for unknown symbols (triggers search fallback)

userStories.title: Update environment variables documentation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need documentation for new API keys.
acceptanceCriteria: Add comments explaining where to get keys and rate limits
